title: Investigating the potential of yacon (Smallanthus sonchifolius) juice in the development of organic apple-based snacks
content:
Publication date: 15 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Giacomo Braschi, Joel Armando Njieukam, Davide Gottardi, Jessica Genovese, Urszula Tylewicz, Francesca Patrignani, Pietro Rocculi
